name: Comet Survival (Working Title)
description:
Basic Story:
You are a space soldier sent to round up scientists in the minutes leading up to full destruction of a comet by the sun. They have set up experiments all around, so you must find them all and make it back to the lander before the comet collapses into dust!

This game is in early, early alpha. There is now very little gameplay, only a timer and some pressure fissures, but this should give a taste at what the atmosphere will be like.

Controls:
  • WASD > Move
  • Mouse > Look
  • Scroll Up/Down > Show/Hide Map
  • Space > Jump
  • Shift > Crouch
  • Esc > Quit
  • A/D > Select (Menu)
  • W > Confirm (Menu)
  • I > Skip Time (Dev)

You might consider this just a basic walking simulator for now, but an early feel for visuals and blocking gives an idea at what is ahead for development!

Made in Godot!
